title: Weekly Recap: PS4 Price Drop, Destiny Gets Microtransactions, Far Cry Primal Revealed
text:
Weekly Recap: PS4 Price Drop, Destiny Gets Microtransactions, Far Cry Primal Revealed 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
THE BIG STUFF:PS4 Price Drop: Big news for the PlayStation 4 this week, as the console got a $50 price cut, bringing the starting cost down ...
